title: Writing Exam Process  |  Online Placement Process  |  Test Credit & Placement  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Admission & Aid Types of Admission Visit DePaul Tuition Room & Board Scholarships Financial Aid Veteran Student Test Credit & PlacementCredit Given by ExamOnline Placement Process Credit Given by Exam Online Placement Process Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Test Credit & Placement>Online Placement Process>Writing Writing Exam Process No preparation is needed to complete the writing process. On the exam, you will review 10 pairs of short statements. For each pair you will select the statement that best represents your previous experience or background with writing. You may begin the Writing Exam placement process by using your BlueKey information to log intoCampus Connect.Once you've logged into Campus Connect, chooseSelf Service>Admission>Next Steps>Placement Process (undergrad)and then click theWriting Testbutton on the Online Placement Process screen. You will receive your exam results during orientation. Based on your exam responses, you will be guided to select the Writing course â€‹that is most appropriate.
